title: 2023: The Best DLC Year Ever? - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

We talk about how awesome DLC was this year and Bless gives his thoughts on awesome games he saw at Day of the Devs.

00:22:23 - Pokemon The Indigo Disk
00:29:36 - Diablo IV and Keeping Up with Live Service Games
00:56:35 - Bless’ Day w/ Day of the Devs
